history.proof: split. - intros H. qsimpl. - intros [q [c [H1 [H2 H3]]]]. apply rel_iter_seq_iter. exists q, c. split. apply H1. split. apply H2. apply H3.

exceptions.tactic: induction H as [q c H1 [H2 [H3 H4]]].

exceptions.exn: No such goal. Focus next goal with bullet -.

original: intros R y x n. split. - intros H. induction H as [q c H1 [H2 [H3 H4]]]. exists q, c. split. apply H1. split. apply H2. apply H4. - intros [q [c [H1 [H2 H3]]]]. apply rel_iter_seq_iter. exists q, c. split. apply H1. split. apply H2. apply H3.
